#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) 
{
	int test;
	scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test--)
	{
		long long int n,p,num;
		scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&p);
		int mod;
		num=n%10;
		mod=p%4;
		if(p==0)
			printf("1\n");
		else
		{
		switch(num)
		{
			case 0:
				printf("0\n");
				break;
			case 1:
				printf("1\n");
				break;
			case 2:
				if(mod==1)	printf("%lld\n",num);
				else if(mod==2)	printf("%lld\n",num*num%10);
				else if(mod==3)	printf("%lld\n",num*num*num%10);
				else if(mod==0)	printf("%lld\n",num*num*num*num%10);
				break;
			case 3:
				if(mod==1)	printf("%lld\n",num);
				else if(mod==2)	printf("%lld\n",num*num%10);
				else if(mod==3)	printf("%lld\n",num*num*num%10);
				else if(mod==0)	printf("%lld\n",num*num*num*num%10);
				break;
			case 4:
				if(mod==1)	printf("%lld\n",num);
				else if(mod==2)	printf("%lld\n",num*num%10);
				else if(mod==3)	printf("%lld\n",num*num*num%10);
				else if(mod==0)	printf("%lld\n",num*num*num*num%10);
				break;
			case 5:
				printf("5\n");
				break;
			case 6:
				printf("6\n");
				break;
			case 7:
				if(mod==1)	printf("%lld\n",num);
				else if(mod==2)	printf("%lld\n",num*num%10);
				else if(mod==3)	printf("%lld\n",num*num*num%10);
				else if(mod==0)	printf("%lld\n",num*num*num*num%10);
				break;
			case 8:
				if(mod==1)	printf("%lld\n",num);
				else if(mod==2)	printf("%lld\n",num*num%10);
				else if(mod==3)	printf("%lld\n",num*num*num%10);
				else if(mod==0)	printf("%lld\n",num*num*num*num%10);
				break;
			case 9:
				if(mod==1)	printf("%lld\n",num);
				else if(mod==2)	printf("%lld\n",num*num%10);
				else if(mod==3)	printf("%lld\n",num*num*num%10);
				else if(mod==0)	printf("%lld\n",num*num*num*num%10);
				break;
		}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
